Trade/Device Name(s): FastPack High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Immunoassay
FastPack High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Calibrator Kit
FastPack High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Controls
FastPack High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Method Verification Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Qualigen FastPack High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Immunoassay and associated calibrator, control, and verification kits for quantification of CRP using a chemiluminescent immunoassay on the FastPack Analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: For evaluation of conditions associated with inflammation in otherwise healthy individuals; intended for use with the FastPack Analyzer, including calibrating, quality control, and verification of the quantitative CRP immunoassay; not for point-of-care use.
